Message.Explanation: Unsupported arguments were passed in an Object[] instance to the LocalizableTextFormatter object.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that all arguments in the Object[] instance that is passed to the LocalizableTextFormatter.setArguments(Object[]) or to LocalizableTextFormatter(String, String, Object[], String) method implement Serializable or one of the LocalizableText interfaces.

Message.MsgText: LTED_06I=LTXT0010I: Final prep of jar file.
Message.Explanation: The JAR file is being modified for deployment

Message.MsgText: LTED_06E=LTXT0013E: Output jar file already exists, recreating.
Message.Explanation: The deployment JAR file already exists; it is being recreated.

Message.MsgText: LTED_09E=LTXT0016E: The required files from ltext.jar where not extracted.
Message.Explanation: The files ibm-ejb-jar-bnd.xmi, ibm-ejb-jar-ext.xmi, and ejb-jar.xml were not extracted from the ltext.jar file.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that these files exist in the ltext.jar file.

Message.MsgText: LTFD_ObjectArray_To_ByteArray_Error=LTXT0001E: An IOException was thrown while writing the Object[] to the byte[].
Message.Explanation: Unsupported arguments were passed in an Object[] instance to the LocalizableTextFormatter object.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that all arguments in the Object[] instance that is passed to the LocalizableTextFormatter.setArguments(Object[]) or LocalizableTextFormatter(String, String, Object[], String) method implement Serializable or one of the LocalizableText interfaces.

Message.MsgText: LTF_RemoteFormat_Error=LTXT0002E: Unable to perform the format method on the LocalizableTextFormatter because of a remote exception.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that the server is configured and running.

Message.MsgText: LTF_PatternKey_ResourceBundle_Not_Set=LTXT0004E: Error occured during LocalizableTextFormatter.localFormat(Locale, TimeZone) or LocalizableTextFormatter.remoteFormat(Locale, TimeZone)
Message.Explanation: Either the pattern key or the resource bundle name is not set in the LocalizableTextFormatter object before formatting.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that your code calls the LocalizableTextFormatter.setPatternKey(String) and LocalizableTextFormatter.setResourceBundleName(String) methods before calling the LocalizableTextFormatter.localFormat(Locale, TimeZone) or LocalizableTextFormatter.remoteFormat(Locale, TimeZone) methods.

Message.Explanation: The LocalizableTextEJBDeploy command is being run.

Message.MsgText: LTED_05E=LTXT0012E: LocalizableText jar file 'ltext.jar' could not be found.
Message.Explanation: The LocalizableText JAR file (ltext.jar) could not be found.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that the installationDirectory command-line argument in the LocalizableTextEJBDeploy call is correct.

Message.MsgText: LTED_08E=LTXT0015E: LocalizableText jar file 'ltext.jar' could not be found.
Message.Explanation: The LocalizableText JAR file (ltext.jar) could not be found.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that the installationDirectory command-line argument in the LocalizableTextEJBDeploy call is correct.

Message.Explanation: The JAR file is being modified for deployment.
The deployment JAR file is being created.

Message.MsgText: LTED_07E=LTXT0014E: Unable to remove existing file:
Message.Explanation: The existing deployment JAR file was not deleted, because it was in use.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that no processes are using the existing JAR file (workingDirectory/LocalizableText.jar).

Message.Explanation: Arguments could not be loaded from the argument array.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that all arguments in the Object[] instance that is passed to the LocalizableTextFormatter.setArguments or LocalizableTextFormatter(String, String, Object[], String) method implement Serializable or one of the LocalizableText interfaces.
